scripts.prestart: meteor npm run install-webui && meteor npm run install-backend
scripts.start: meteor npm run start-webui & meteor npm run start-backend
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && meteor npm run dev
scripts.start-webui: cd webui && meteor npm run dev
scripts.prebuild: meteor npm run install-webui && meteor npm run install-backend
scripts.build: meteor npm run build-backend && meteor npm run build-webui
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && meteor npm run build
scripts.build-webui: cd webui && meteor npm run build
scripts.dockerize: meteor npm run dockerize-backend && meteor npm run dockerize-webui
scripts.dockerize-backend: cd backend && meteor npm run dockerize
scripts.dockerize-webui: cd webui && meteor npm run dockerize
